packbuggies.descripcio: Come and enjoy a buggy tour. Stroll along paths around and live the thrill of driving a buggy, enjoying nature and cultural heritage that surrounds us. Stop and enjoy an exciting paintball game or a room escape. Combine as you like. Buggy + paintball or buggy + room escape.
packbuggies.nota: * In order to drive a buggy you must be over 25 years old and have more than two years of license.
